author: cnbc.com
title: Shell Publishes Annual Report and Form 20-F
text:
THE HAGUE, Netherlands, March 15, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
Royal Dutch Shell plc (NYSE:RDS.A) (NYSE: RDS.B) published its Annual Report and Form 20-F for the year ended December 31, 2017.
The 2017 Annual Report and Form 20-F can be downloaded from http://www.shell.com/annualreport .
Printed copies of the 2017 Annual Report and Form 20-F will be available from April 19, 2018, and can be requested, free of charge, at http://www.shell.com/annualreport .
The Annual Report and Accounts will be submitted to the Annual General Meeting to be held on May 22, 2018.
